Tim Trice

June 11, 2017

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(HURDAT)
library(knitr)
library(pander)
library(rrricanes)

df <- data.frame(c('a','b','c'),c(1,2,3))
emphasize.strong.cells(which(df == 3, arr.ind = TRUE))
pander(df)
